key_talking_points: Edmonton's Darnell Nurse was penalized for high-sticking Carter Verhaeghe at 19:23 remaining in the first period. Florida will go on the power play.
The Florida Panthers are currently leading the Edmonton Oilers 5-4 early in the first period.
There have been several hits recorded in the first minute of the game, indicating a physical start.
for_commentary_agent.context: A penalty creates a power play opportunity for Florida. Focus should be on the power play setup and potential scoring chances. Maintain awareness of the score; Edmonton is down by one goal. The volume of hits suggests a physical game; highlighting this element might be beneficial.

game_context.game_situation: Even strength, upcoming power play for FLA

high_intensity_events.summary: Darnell Nurse (EDM) penalized for high-sticking Carter Verhaeghe (FLA) at 19:23 of the first period.

task_details.specific_guidance: Monitor Florida's power play setup and Edmonton's penalty kill strategy.
